item.description:
Join us to celebrate the release of "The Lucky Ones: My Passionate Fight For Farm Animals" by Woodstock Farm Animal Sanctuaryâ€™s Director Jenny Brown, with Gretchen Primack

Enjoy fantastic comfort food at the hip Veggie Galaxy! 450 Massachusetts Avenue (right in Central Square)

Hope to see you there and please spread the word!

Click here for more info:

http://woodstocksanctuary.org/2012/10/the-lucky-ones-boston-book-release-bash/
item.name: The Lucky Ones book release party at Veggie Galaxy
